Body:
- Fingerprint sensor (PayPal certified)
- S Pen stylus

Camera.Features: Dual Shot, Simultaneous HD video and image recording, geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, panorama, HDR
Camera.Primary: 16 MP, 5312 x 2988 pixels, optical image stabilization, autofocus, LED flash, check quality
Camera.Video: 2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, optical stabilization, dual-video rec., check quality

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot

Features:
- Fast battery charging: 60% in 30 min (Quick Charge 2.0)
- ANT+ support
- S-Voice natural language commands and dictation
- Air gestures
- Dropbox (50 GB cloud storage)
- Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
- MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player
- MP3/WAV/eAAC+/AC3/FLAC player
- Photo/video editor
- Document editor
Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, gesture, UV, heart rate, SpO2

Misc.Colors: Frosted white, Charcoal black, Bronze Gold, Blossom Pink

Network.Speed:
HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps (N910C)
HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps (N910S)

Platform.CPU:
Quad-core 2.7 GHz Krait 450 (SM-N910S)
Quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A57 (SM-N910C)
Platform.OS: Android OS, v4.4.4 (KitKat), upgradable to v5.0.1 (Lollipop)

Tests.Performance:
Basemark OS II: 1181 / Basemark OS II 2.0: 1328
Basemark X: 18684

main.canonical_name: Available versions: SM-N910F (Europe), SM-N910K/SM-N910L/SM-N910S (Korea), SM-N910C (Asia, Europe, South America), SM-N910FD (United Arab Emirates), SM-N910FQ (Turkey), SM-N910H (Asia-Pacific), SM-N910G (Singapore, India, Australia), SM-N910U (Hong Kong, Taiwan, Australia, New Zealand, Chile), SM-N910W8 (North America)
